title: 95/430/EC: Council Decision of 18 September 1995 appointing members and alternate members of the Committee of the Regions
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 18 September 1995  appointing members and alternate members of the Committee of the Regions (95/430/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 September 1995.
For the Council The President P. SOLBES MIRA
